nodes.text: Florg Nerfherder was a male Rodian Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. He trained in the Jedi Temple, and fought a Jedi in the Temple dueling ring. He wielded a blue-green lightsaber.

Florg Nerfherder is a stand-in character in the multiplayer duels if no other player is selected. However, he is most likely a canon character, as he is seen training behind Jedi Master Luminara Unduli elsewhere in the Temple, with the same lightsaber and robes.
